content:
ICS 280 - Security Algorithms Assignments

Spring, 2002

  • Homework 1: due Monday, April 15, 2002: Come prepared to discuss denial-of-service attacks. Reading: See Course Notes.
  • Homework 2: due Monday, April 22, 2002: Come prepared to discuss secure routing algorithms. Reading: See Course Notes.
  • Homework 3: due Monday, May 13, 2002: Come prepared to discuss authenticated data structures. Reading: See Course Notes.

Goodrich's Home Page.
